meanings.definition: The quality of being assertive or forceful in pursuing one's goals.
meanings.sent1: Her pushfulnesses in the meeting helped her team reach a consensus quickly.
meanings.sent2: I admire his pushfulnesses in standing up for what he believes in.
meanings.sent3: His pushfulnesses in asking for extra dessert made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pushfulnesses of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The coach's pushfulnesses motivated the team to give their best performance.

meanings.definition: The act of pushing or exerting pressure to move something forward.
meanings.sent1: With a strong pushfulnesses, she managed to open the jammed door.
meanings.sent2: The pushfulnesses of the crowd helped the car get unstuck from the mud.
meanings.sent3: The pushfulnesses of the toddler trying to move the heavy box was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The pushfulnesses of the wind against the sail propelled the boat forward.
meanings.sent5: The pushfulnesses of the bulldozer cleared the path in no time.
